price: তেওঁ গায়েব আৰু উপস্থিত (যাৱতীয় বিষয়ৰ) জ্ঞানী, প্ৰবল পৰাক্ৰমশালী, পৰম দয়ালু।
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: dhālika ʿālimu al-ghaybi wal-shahādati al-ʿazīzu al-raḥīmu
